subject: Attention:Beneficiary,
body:
Attention:Beneficiary,
Have you received your payment which was scheduled to be remitted to you on 27th Janary 2024. You have to confirm back to this investigation office if you have been fully paid and compensated.
Kindly specify the following below:
FULL NAME:
AMOUNT TRANSFERRED:
AMOUNT EXPECTING:
DIRECT MOBILE NUMBER:
I will be waiting to hear from you immediately. Get back to me on my direct email address: (
unitednationassistedprogam@gmail.com
)
Thank You.
Mr Philip Brown
Funds investigator

subject: Re: Attention:Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. Philip Brown,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry, but I don't recall any payment that was scheduled to be remitted to me in January. Could you please provide me with more details about the payment? What is it for and who is it from?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying this matter. Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Howard
